Patent Information.Patent Title: Use of antimicrobial proteins and peptides for the treatment of otitis media and paranasal sinusitis.
Patent Information.Abstract: The pharmaceutical composition and a method of treatment of infectious diseases, such as otitis media, paranasal sinusitis, labyrinthitis and meningitis are described. The composition comprises EP2E or homologues thereof.

Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bovine Beta-defensin 12 (bBD-12; BNBD-12; BNDB-12; mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus 502A (MIC=10-300 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML35 (MIC=10-300 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has bactericidal activity. Active against E. coli ML35 and S. aureus 502A.

Literature.Title: Purification, primary structures, and antibacterial activities of Beta-defensins, a new family of antimicrobial peptides from bovine neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Selsted ME, Tang YQ, Morris WL, McGuire PA, Novotny MJ, Smith W, Henschen AH, Cullor JS.

Literature.Title: Characterization of the disulfide motif in BNBD-12, an antimicrobial beta-defensin peptide from bovine neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Tang YQ, Selsted ME.

Literature.Title: Solution structure of bovine neutrophil beta-defensin-12: the peptide fold of the beta-defensins is identical to that of the classical defensins.
Literature.Author: Pardi A.,Selsted M.E.,Legault P.,Zimmermann G.R.
